@lov3_rs_money wrote:

[quote=“vato, post:1, topic:190592”]i tried adding drops to my npc(id 1320)

public static int randomBunny() { return Bunny[(int)(Math.random()*Bunny.length)]; }

then in npc handler

if(npcs[1320].npcType == 1320) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBunny(), npcs[1320].absX, npcs[1320].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(1320), false); }

got an error here

NPCHandler.java:2008: class, interface, or enum expected if(npcs[1320].npcType == 1320) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2010: class, interface, or enum expected }→ ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 06:52:36 AM[/size][hr]help plz??[/quote]
where have u put the drops, the item ids?
like this?

public static int Bunny[] = {(IDS)};

    public static int randomBunny()
    {
    	return Bunny[(int)(Math.random()*Bunny.length)];
    }

thats what should be in item2.
hope it helps
~lov3_rs_money
